Name: Dawn of a Soul
About the game: Dawn of a Soul is a mathematical puzzle game starring chains and combos. Progress through levels by building chains and combos to achieve the target score. In each level you have to find the perfect balanced path with a limited number of moves. Learn how to use different types of puzzle elements and their special features. Discover visual and mathematical patterns and adapt them to new challenges. Master your logical skills and beat all 64 puzzles. KEY FEATURES Full control over chains and combos in a unique way Challenging rise of the difficulty level Basic mathematical & logical skills 64 handcrafted Puzzles 4 gameplay areas of focus Minimalistic fantasy setting and mystical atmosphere
